headline: LyondellBasell to address 2024 Goldman Sachs Industrials and Materials Conference
summary: HOUSTON and LONDON, Nov. 27, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- LyondellBasell (NYSE: LYB), a leader in the global chemical industry, today announced Michael McMurray, executive vice president and chief financial officer, will participate in a fireside chat at the 2024 Goldman Sachs Industrials and Materials Conference in New York on Wednesday, December 4, 2024, at 8 a.m. EST. Webcast and Presentation Slides AccessA live webcast can be accessed at the time of the event at https://investors.lyondellbasell.
